mapper.sql: dict_id, dt_code, dict_type, dict_key, dict_created_time, dict_pid, dict_sort
mapper.insert: insert into yd_dict (dict_id, dt_code, dict_type, dict_key, dict_created_time, dict_pid, dict_sort, dict_value) values (#{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictCreatedTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{dictPid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into yd_dict
dict_id,
dt_code,
dict_type,
dict_key,
dict_created_time,
dict_pid,
dict_sort,
dict_value,
#{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dictCreatedTime,jdbcType=TIME},
#{dictPid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update yd_dict
dt_code = #{dtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_key = #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_created_time = #{dictCreatedTime,jdbcType=TIME},
dict_pid = #{dictPid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dict_sort = #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yd_dict set dt_code = #{dtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_key = #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_created_time = #{dictCreatedTime,jdbcType=TIME}, dict_pid = #{dictPid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_sort = #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yd_dict set dt_code = #{dtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_key = #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_created_time = #{dictCreatedTime,jdbcType=TIME}, dict_pid = #{dictPid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_sort = #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dict_id,dict_value,dict_type from yd_dict where dict_type=#{dictType} order by dict_sort desc
